overview:
Sam specializes in idea generation and business strategy. He helps entrepreneurs start companies by tackling the early challenges we all face when starting a company.

Sam was the Creative Director of a company called TILE and has a background in innovation and entrepreneurial start-ups.

In 2005, Sam helped create a company called “imp” which would help magazines and newspapers put music and videos on their websites. He was in charge of much of the creative thinking in the company but also built his skills in business development and strategy. He raised the first million dollar round of funding from angel investors and was responsible for about a dozen of the company’s initial partnerships.

At Fahrenheit 212, Sam helped create new businesses and products for mostly Fortune 500 companies. As Business Manager, he worked both on the business side and on the innovation sides of the process.

Sam started Minnesota Culture Club (www.mncultureclub.com), a webiste/blog/calendar that reviews promotes Minnesota bands and artists when they go on tour (outside of MN).

Sam is also a board director of the Threshold Foundation (www.thresholdfoundation.com).
